content:
To commission me, read and agree my T.O.S (Terms of services)
Read before ordering any artwork. They are for personal use only (please contact me for commercial licensing) 💜 I-Contact:
Via my socials or please use the form
language spoken :
French English Portuguese (Brazilian) Spanish 💜 II- Common Sense:
Be polite No spamming the rights to decline commissions is at my discretion 💜 III-Payment:
All payments are upfront I take Paypal and bank transfer Prices are non-negotiable 💜 IV-What do I draw?
I draw :
safe for work material
Any species (real or fantasy) Anthropomorphic characters Feral Toony Kid’s illustration Chibis Pets NSFW material +18:
erotism/explicit NSFW/ BDSM / Kinks I don’t draw:
Realism Humans complex backgrounds Some fetishism such as watersports, scat, vomit… 💜 V- Ordering:
I’ll add you on my Trello (waiting list). You have to be over 18 y/o to be able to commission me an NSFW artwork Payment will be on Paypal or bank transfer. -Send me one or multiple references of your character , or describe it as much as possible. Sketch validation. You can ask as many modifications as you please without any charges After the sketch, i’ll send you the line art. Charges may apply if you ask for major changes I will then send you the finished product 💜 VI- The Waiting list:
All potential customers will be put in here. There is no engagement until the commission is fully paid. Even though there is no engagement , it would be nice to notify me in case of cancellation or delaying of the project. 💜 VII- Cancellation:
No refunds in general. I’m only providing refunds if I’m unable to finish he project 💜 VIII- Delivery:
I’ll keep you updated on my progression as much as possible. Waiting time will depend of your position on the waiting list (post payment) I don’t have any defined deadlines, but I will try to work as fast as I can! If you want your artwork to be delivered at a specific date, please notify me (extra fees may apply) 💜 IX - Don’t :
Remove my signature from the finished artwork Make unauthorized modifications on said artwork 💜 X: Extras:
Don’t forget to credit me if you can. I will repost all the drawings on my socials and most likely on my pricelist as examples If it’s a gift, please don’t forget to notify me, so I don’t post it at my socials and spoil the surprise. Conract if you have any questions, or simply wants to give some constructive feedback !
title: T.O.S (Terms of services)
